long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In the age of the internet, the ability to browse the web is essential in everyday life. WebStylus makes the internet a more accessible and customizable place, so everyone can better enjoy the knowledge it has to offer.

WebStylus allows the user to customize their browsing experience to their own needs. WebStylus boasts dark and night mode filters, saturation and contrast adjustment, and an experimental colourblind-accessible function. This blend of features makes it so that this extension helps the visually impaired with their browsing, while still offering convenient customizability for everyday users.

WebStylus is still in early development. In the future, it will have more advanced customizability and accessibility features, such as AI alt text, text-to-speech, and more! 

Developed by Matthew Y, Raymon D, and Derek G.
